item.title: TopK
item.description: public static int topK(int[] arr, int k) { if (arr == null || k > arr.length || arr.length == 0 || k <= 0) { return -1; } PriorityQueue<Integer> queue = new PriorityQueue<>(k, Comparator.reverseOrder()); for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) { queue.add(arr[i]); } for (int i = k; i < arr.length; i++) { if (queue.peek() > arr[i]) { queue.

item.title: æ•°ç»„è½¬æ ‘
item.description: private TreeNode buildTree(Integer[] array, int index) { TreeNode treeNode; if (index < array.length) { Integer value = array[index]; if (value == null) { return null; } treeNode = new TreeNode(value); treeNode.left = buildTree(array, 2 * index + 1); treeNode.right = buildTree(array, 2 * index + 2); return treeNode; } return null; }

item.title: LRUCache
item.description: public class LRUCache<K,V>{ private final int cap; private final Map<K,V> map; private final LinkedList<K> list; public LRUCache(int cap) { this.cap = cap; map = new HashMap<>(cap); list = new LinkedList<>(); } public void put(K key, V value) { if (map.size() == cap){ K first = list.removeFirst(); map.remove(first); } list.addLast(key); map.put(key, value); } public V get(K key) { V value = map.
